articles.author: Nic Savage
articles.title: Warner’s walk-off in ‘bizarre’ cricket drama
articles.description: Australia has secured a comprehensive five-wicket victory over Zimbabwe in the first ODI at Riverway Stadium, with opener David Warner handed a reprieve following a “bizarre” sequence of events during the run chase.

articles.title: Rs 5,000 Fine For India-Pak Match Watch Parties: Srinagar College Order
articles.description: The National Institute of Technology (NIT) here has asked its students not to watch Sunday's India-Pakistan Asia Cup cricket match in groups or post anything related to it on social media platforms.
articles.content:
The students have also been directed to avoid posting any material related to the match on social media.

articles.author: Jennifer Hiller
articles.title: Disney Gets Deal to Broadcast Cricket Events in India
articles.description: The company has secured a deal to air four years of global cricket events to its subscribers in India, after losing broadcast rights earlier this year for a popular Indian cricket league.
articles.content:
